app.description: App that loads Order information from Dawanda.
app.instructions:
To install the app:
1 - You just need to add your API token from dawanda. For that, follow the instructions here: http://en.dawanda.com/apps/new
2 - Add the auto-generated custom field "Order ID" to all your forms.

To use the app:

There are two different ways to retrieve an order detail.
1. Use the custom field.
2. Search for the order ID on the search bar within the app.
